setup.setup_speak: The skill still needs to be set up via a web page, to do this open the Alexa app and then under the More tab open the activities and follow the instructions.

card.title: Skill setup needed
card.message: Open https://skills.manuelschuler.dev and enter the following Code: %code%

setup.email_setup_speak: To setup the skill I will send you an email.

email_permissions_status.ACCEPTED: I've send you an email. Click on the link to setup the skill.
email_permissions_status.DENIED: The skill still needs to be set up via a web page, to do this open the Alexa app and then under the More tab open the activities and follow the instructions.
email_permissions_status.REDIRECT_TO_APP: Please open your Alexa app to grant the permissions to your email address.

channel_stats: Your channel has get %views% views with in total %videos% videos
welcome: Hello %username%. Your channel has currently %subscribers% subscribers.
help: You can say subscribers, last video, channel statistics or last comment
